== Test Cases: Application Availability ==
=== Introduction ===
These cases are designed illustrate a way that individual cases results can be tracked. This is also a format that can be used by a py tool to gather case results into a spreadsheet/wiki page. that script is under development.
<<BR>>
<<BR>>
When executing these cases you must complete all the steps in each section before the cases status table can be updated. Partially completed cases should keep the information of the last build where the case was completed.
